headline.main: BACKING OF PETAIN FOR DARLAN SEEN; Writer Says Americans in Africa Told Him Marshal Approved Aide's Step DE GAULLISTS INCENSED London Taken by Surprise by Admiral's Coup -- Accord on Use of Dakar Hinted

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Dec. 2 -- Admiral Jean Francois Darlan has received the secret approval of Marshal Henri Philippe Petain for his pro-Allied administration of French North Africa, and he hopes to make his post there permanent, United States authorities in Africa told me.
abstract: J A Parris dispatch on Darlan situation
